name: CLKComplicationServer
desc: An object that manages the active complications for an app.

items.name: var activeComplications: [CLKComplication]?
items.desc: The active complications for the current app.

items.name: func reloadTimeline(for: CLKComplication)
items.desc: Invalidates your existing timeline data and triggers an update session to reload it.

items.name: func extendTimeline(for: CLKComplication)
items.desc: Asks the system to extend the data in your complicationâ€™s timeline.

items.name: func reloadComplicationDescriptors()
items.desc: Reloads the complication descriptors from the complication data source.

items.name: static let CLKComplicationServerActiveComplicationsDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the set of active complications changes.
